The active player can trade Cards with the other Players.
The active player can found a parish in one of the 3 cities shown by the open cards. For this he has to give the 4 person and goods shown on the city card. dependent on the Position of Petrus he may pay less (neighbored area on the map 3, same field 2, but always the love card).
The player gets the city Card, a new one replaces it on the board.
The turn of the player is interrupted if he reaches with his dice roll the P field (exact or not). The pawn is placed on the P. Paulus pawn moves to the next city in the series. Each parish (owner of it) gets one word card. Additional one for some cities (Jerusalem, same area as Paulus).
Player continues with a new die roll.
Game ends when Paulus reaches the last city of the series.
Winner is the player with the most victory points.
Points: 1 VP for each word Card. Bonus for more than half or all of the word cards of a cathegory.

178720.description:
42 cards deck expansion for Need for Speed
The cards are known, it is not a blind booster.
178720.name: Need for Speed Trading Card Game: Canyon Rush

178722.description:
42 cards deck expansion for Need for Speed
The cards are known, it is not a blind booster.
178722.name: Need for Speed Trading Card Game: Beach Blitz

178723.description:
42 cards deck expansion for Need for Speed
The cards are known, it is not a blind booster.
178723.name: Need for Speed Trading Card Game: Downtown Dash

178724.name: Sine Requie: Il Regno di Osiride
178724.description:
From the back of the book:
Oh Re, raccogli le tue ossa, le tue membra, purifica i tuoi denti e allontana la sabbia che ricopre il tuo volto

English translation:
Oh King, collect your bones, your limbs, cleanses your teeth and throw away the sand that covers your face

178726.name: Sine Requie: Urla dal Silenzio
178726.description:
From the back of the book:
Le quattro avventure vincitrici del Concorso Ludico Letterario "Urla dal Silenzio" riunite in un unico modulo.

English translation:
The four adventures winners of the competition "Scream from Silence" brought together in a single module.

178727.name: Sine Requie: Urla dal Silenzio - Vol. 2
178727.description:
From the back of the book:
Eccoci al volume frutto dell'edizione 2006 del concorso "Urla da Silenzio"!

English translation:
Here the volume originated from the 2006 competition "Scream from Silence"!

178728.name: Khet 2.0
178728.description:
The Laser Game Khet 2.0: Using simple rules that can be learned in minutes, players alternate turns moving Egyptian themed mirrored pieces, after which they fire their laser with the goal of blasting their opponents Pharaoh to win the game!

Source: The Publisher Website.

178729.name: Project H.O.P.E.
178729.description:
From the back of the book:
In Project H.O.P.E. Potrete calarvi nei panni di un Meta-Umano, un supereroe delle Forze Alleate che combatte contro le Forze dell’Asse sullo sfondo del Secondo Conflitto Mondiale.

English translation:
In Project H.O.P.E. you will be in the shoes of a Meta-Human, a superhero of the Allied Forces fighting against the Axis forces in the background of World War II.

178730.name: Götterdämmerung: Atto I
178730.description:
From the publisher website:
In Götterdämmerung potrete vivere gli ultimi mesi di guerra sul fronte occidentale, dallo Sbarco in Normandia alla Battaglia di Berlino.

English translation:
In Götterdämmerung you will spend the last months of the war on the Western Front, from the Battle of Normandy to the Battle of Berlin.

178731.name: Terraforming: The Druidic Craft
178731.description:
In this terrain tile manipulation game, 2 to 4 Druids match wits to transform the terrain to match their own personal goal. Every Druid has a unique ability, and with the use of movement, standard actions, action cards, and well planned strategy, they set out to transform the land to their liking.

It's not worker placement, it's not tile placement, it's tile manipulation! No dice to decide your fate - just your cunning, wits, and planning. Are you ready to transform the land to the way you want it? After all, you are a Druid; you should be able to do that without any problem. But watch out for the other Druids disrupting your terraforming!

You win the game by completing your personal goal - even on someone else's turn! To complete your goal, all terrain tiles specified on your Goal Card must be face-up on the game board in the layout specified. While you are trying to complete your goal, your opponents are also trying to complete their own - which could disrupt your tactics and planning.

The standard game is played on a field of Terrain Tiles laid out in a 5 x 5 configuration. On your turn, you may Pass (take no moves or actions) and draw a Spell Card. Or you may take one Move Action, one Standard Action, and as many Free Actions as you desire (in ANY order). Then at the end of your turn, draw one Spell Card (yes, that means if you Pass, you get two Spell Cards). Download the Rules to learn how all the Actions work.

The Terrain Tiles are double sided and represent many types of terrain like mountains, water, desert, grassland, and frozen tundra, as well as special areas like a village or a tavern. But there are two very special terrain types: there is the Mystical Wild Tile that is a wild Terrain Tile, and then there is the Void Tile that no player can move through or land on.

Included with the game are four variants: one to make the game easier, one to make the game longer and more challenging, one that increases the size of the game area (to 6 x 6 tiles), and then there is the Black Druid variant, who adds a truly chaotic element to the game.

178732.name: Sekai dai Ichi: i migliori del mondo
178732.description:
From the publisher website:
In Sekai dai Ichi troverete: un’esaustiva descrizione dello scenario bellico del Pacifico. Le due fazioni in lotta, Impero del Giappone e Stati Uniti d’America. Nuove classi, nuovi poteri e gadgets

English translation:
In Sekai Ichi you will find: a comprehensive description of the scenario of war in the Pacific. The two warring factions, the Empire of Japan and the United States of America. New classes, new powers and gadgets

178733.name: All The Damn Vampires
rpgseries: RPG Geek Fiasco Playset Contest 2015: Mythical / Supernatural
178733.description:
Publishers Blurb

Bless your heart
Snopesboro is a small Southern town, full of historic buildings, gracious living, and quirky charm. It straddles the picturesque Shoccoree River. It’s also got a slight vampire problem.

You’ll never grow old...
Unfortunately, y’all are the vampires. You may not be too clear on how the change happened, or you may know all too well. Either way, you’ve got to figure out what to do now that you’re dead.

...And you must feed
Being undead comes with significant drawbacks, true. But it also has a few perks. You’ve got to make some lifestyle adjustments now, but maybe you can also adjust a few other things before people catch on to what’s happening. Death is only the beginning, hon. If you’re clever, you’ll come up out of this mess smelling like roses.

178734.name: Rocky Mountain Murder
178734.description:
The Crime: Welcome to the beautiful world of Banff, Alberta: A playground of adventure . . . and intrigue! Charles Vandersnoot, the wealthy owner of posh ski resort, Mystery Mountain, shocked everyone in Banff when he announced he was dying of a rare disease. Even more shocking was when Charles was found murdered – killed by a single gunshot while riding his own chairlift!

Everyone is a suspect in this chilling crime! See if you can help expose the killer.

The Game: Spice up your party by adding a little mystery and a dash of murder to the evening. Just invite eight to ten guests to dress up and play the roles of the scheming suspects and you’re in for an evening of unforgettable fun! No one is who they appear to be . . . can you find the killer?

The Suspects: Bunny Vandersnoot, Cecilia Vandersnoot, Chet Jet-Set, Doctor T Bar, Franz Flash, Gertrude Greenrun, Hank “Hot Dog” Hooper & Rudy Red-Eyes
Extra Players (Non Suspects): Ranger Rick & Roxy Rundle

The Contents:
Party Planner
Eight Character Booklets
Two Character Booklets for bonus players
Ten Character Profi les to include with invitations
Ten Party Invitations and Envelopes
Eight Secret Clues
Compact Disc Co-host: Complete with introduction, evening commentary and solution to the mystery

178735.name: Subrace: Shadow Elves
178735.description:
From publisher blurb:

Fighting back from the brink of death, these elves came back... different, darker, stronger.

We present a new subrace of elf for your character creation needs!

Resist the necrosis that burns your body
Explore what it means to descend into undeath
Disperse yourself into shadows to instantly step forth from another pool of darkness

178736.name: Super Happy Sentai Hour Companion-1
178736.description:
From publisher blurb:

The first supplement for the amazing roleplaying game Super Happy Sentai Hour, including new options for your game including new color options, Henshin rules for solo players, and additional rules for mecha and gestalts. And for the GM we offer new monster du jour charts, mook options and rules for playing the bad guys! Everything you need to add new options and take your Super Happy Sentai Hour experience to the next level.

178737.name: Everyman Unchained: Unchained Rage
178737.description:
From publisher blurb:

Unleash your inner rage with the newest release from Everyman Gaming, LLC: Everyman Unchained: Unchained Rage. Perfect for GMs using the unchained barbarian, this product helps GMs apply the unchained rage mechanics with the following mechanics:

Unchained versions of the bloodrager and skald that are built off of the math-light versions of the unchained rage class feature.
Half a dozen rewritten rage-based feats from the Pathfinder Roleplaying Game.
Unchained versions of the rage prophet and stalwart defender prestige class.
A handy sidebar to help GMs bring non-unchained rage powers into the hands of Unchained characters.
And more!

178739.name: King of New York Promo Cards
boardgamecompilation: King of New York: Hibernation
King of New York: Improvised Weapons
King of New York: New York City Defender
King of New York: St. George Theater
King of New York: U.N. Head Quarters
178739.description:
This promotional set of 5 cards is to be used with the base game for King of New York. The set includes:


Hibernation
Improvised Weapons
New York City Defender
St. George Theater
UN Headquarters

178740.name: Mudslide (Supers!)
178740.description:
From publisher blurb:

Limping his way through life, Lester Mullins was on a long road to nowhere. It was on this road of quirky luck that road led to an accident, sparking his mutant ability. Now a massive nuisance to the public and Law Enforcement alike, Lester has massive ability and a monstrous appearance as Mudslide!

Enemy Strike Files are character packs detailing a villainous threat for your SUPERS! Revised Edition games. The Enemies are extensively detailed so that they can be seamlessly integrated into your games; from a one-shot to an ongoing campaign.

178741.name: Infinite Threats 03
178741.description:
From publisher blurb:

Need a few alien critters to kill off in your Infinite Futures Games? Are your players bored with blasting droids and robots? Well Avalon has just the thing, new threats to encounter. Each threat is a fully detailed creature, usable in any game you want or as part of the Fringe setting.

Explore the danger of space with new threat expansions, so keep your eye out for new releases and expansion for the Infinite Futures system.

Inside you will find fully detailed stats and information on…

The Bachen, a plant like cat
The Goz, a skilled hunter
The KD-Hornet Drone
The Plastid, a new kind of android
The Chriodia, a new race on the Fringe

boardgamecompilation: Splendor: AsmOPlay Kit
178742.description: Four new nobles tiles to be used for Splendor. Artwork includes two new female nobles and two male nobles, and all the gem goals are different than the base game. The bottom right-hand corner of each tile is marked with a "p" to indicate that it is a promotional noble.
178742.name: Splendor: Nobles Promo Tiles

Game Trade Magazine is the leading consumer guide to the Adventure Hobby industry. With previews, reviews, and sneak peeks at upcoming games.

178752.name: Memoria Myrana (Issue 33 - Jul 2012)

27 - Myranor Szene - Im Zeichen der Götter – Vorab-Infos
28 - Impressum

178753.name: Service is Eternal
178753.description:
From publisher blurb:

We are the First Ones.
Lordship is our burden.
Obedience is our birthright.
Power is fickle.
Service is Eternal.

This book contains everything you need to know, build and use the First Ones of Saggakar in your campaign. These horrible creatures include the partially elven Drovite, the common Exodites, the magically-empowered Grexodites, the shadow-obsessed Harovites, the demonic Netherlings and the drider-like Spiderlings.

Together they are the Tyrants of Saggakar.

The book contains a big section on who the First Ones, where they come from, their mindset, the history of the world, how they interact with other groupd. There is a full section focused on First One Concepts to ensure every First One in your campaign is unique and interesting. A section on how to use them in your campaign.

A section on First One religion, how the Dark Gods are representative of the First Ones themselves, and why the First Ones believe THEY are the gods.

The book also includes character options and archetypes, such as the Cavalier Order of the Whip, the Cleric Cult Leader, Twenty-five new feats, new weapons, new alchemical material including the medenite slime items, new poisons, new magic items, five new prestige classes, over twenty new spells, new monster to serve the First Ones, and a seven new traps including the chamber of madness, and the slimed floor.

Jammed pack with tools, trics and ways to use the First Ones, this book is the ideal resource for your Saggakar campaign, or to add something dark, evil, and exciting to your own campaign.

178754.name: Z War One: Damnation
178754.description:
Z War One is the world's first episodic, comic book miniature board game. It blends classic survival horror & RPG themes with intense tactical combat, to provide a cinematic and truly unique gaming experience.

The Z War One Issue #1 box set contains the extended first issue of the comic, along with the base set of models & boards you need to start playing the game. Each subsequent comic book acts as an expansion pack, continuing the game's epic story, whilst introducing new miniatures, game mechanics & environments along the way.

Players take control of one of 4 main protaganists, completing chapters & gaining vital experience points, with which they must upgrade their character if they are to have any hope of surviving the increasingly nightmarish scenarios.

In addition to the game's co-operative comic book campaign, the quick-play "Director Mode" allows one player to connect with their devious side, using director cards to stack the odds in favour of the infected hordes!

Although there are multiple ways in which Z War One can be played, the real heart of the game lies in it's 1-4 player co-operative comic book campaign. The Season One 6 issue campaign is made up of 26 exciting chapters, with the climax of each chapter taking place on the game board. The cinematic mood created by the comic carries through directly into the game play, as time limits & set pieces drive the story forward at a breakneck pace. The missions themselves, whilst working from the same core set of game mechanics, vary widely in tone, from exploration & tense survival horror to all-out pitched battles and daring escapes.

Whilst the co-operative campaign is by no means easy, for more experienced players, there is the "Directors Cut" which adds game play elements from the quick play "Director Mode" to the campaign, essentially allowing a 5th player to participate and make life hell for the heroes.

178755.name: Saggakar Primer
178755.description:
From publisher blurb:

The following is a short primer to allow you to start creating characters for the Legacies campaign. The Tyrants of Saggakar Campaign Setting will have additional character options, including new racial alternate traits, character archetypes, prestige classes and spells.

178756.name: Cohort Guide
178756.description:
From publisher blurb:

This document expands the Legacies Organized Play Campaign options to allow players to take and use the Leadership feat in the campaign. A PC with the Leadership is called the “Leader” while the cohort is referred to as the “cohort”. Cohorts can add to a character’s role-playing and they can provide additional services to the party.

However, cohorts are not there to “steal the show” and are members of the support cast. Still they occasionally rise to the occasion and save the day.

In many ways, Samwise Gamgee from the Lord of the Rings trilogy is a cohort: he supports Froddo on his quest.

178757.name: Guide To Crafting
178757.description:
From publisher blurb:

A guide to creating and using magical and mundane items in the Legacies Organized Play campaign.

178758.name: Another Bunch of Content (Issue 4 - Feb 2015)
178758.description:
From publisher blurb:

The fourth issue of the monthly system neutral series Another Bunch of Content has been released! Each month, InfiniBadger Press brings you 26 new pieces of open content for you to use in your games, one for each letter of the alphabet. Monsters, items, locations, people, encounters, dungeons, and a slew of anything else that that we think that you might be interested in will all be put together into these jam-packed system-neutral newsletters for your gaming utility and pleasure.

178760.description:
Star Trek - Attack Wing: U.S.S. Valiant Expansion Pack is part of the Wave 22 expansion packs from WizKids Games, and this expansion comes with one new ship and a new set of cards for Star Trek: Attack Wing.

The Valiant is a Defiant class ship.
178760.name: Star Trek: Attack Wing – U.S.S. Valiant Expansion Pack
boardgamefamily: Star Trek: Attack Wing Miniatures Game

178761.name: Star Trek: Attack Wing – R.I.S. Pi Expansion Pack
boardgamefamily: Star Trek: Attack Wing Miniatures Game
178761.description:
Star Trek - Attack Wing: R.I.S. Pi Expansion Pack is part of the Wave 22 expansion packs from WizKids Games, and this expansion comes with one new ship and a new set of cards for Star Trek: Attack Wing.

The Pi is a Romulan scout vessel class ship.

178762.description:
Star Trek - Attack Wing: Kumari Expansion Pack is part of the Wave 22 expansion packs from WizKids Games, and this expansion comes with one new ship and a new set of cards for Star Trek: Attack Wing.

The Kumari is an Andorian ship.
178762.name: Star Trek: Attack Wing – Kumari Expansion Pack
boardgamefamily: Star Trek: Attack Wing Miniatures Game

178763.name: Elixir (Issue 1 - Aug 1993)
rpgissuearticle: A l'auberge du bois de Peu
178763.description:
Nearly all articles are credited to apocryphal names, including: Nounours, Tof, Lionel, Shemibob, Herbix l'Ancien, Arnaud le Barbare, etc.

Art includes a selection of Larry Elmore which previously appeared in Dragon magazine and is used with attribution but without permission. Other art is uncredited.

Producer and principal contributor is credited only as Bass.

178764.name: The Grimoire (Issue 1 - Spring 1978)
rpgissuearticle: A Couple of Notes on WarpWar
Map of Arn and Surrounding Areas
Minidungeon Feature: THe Tomb of Lord Advandey
New Character Class for Dungeon! - The Thief
New Independents for WB&RM: The Oathbreakers
178764.description: Computer generated hex sheets (with code listing), many articles on D&D, and articles on WarpWar, Dungeon!, White Bear and Red Moon, Stellar Conquest. Fiction. Mini-dungeon.

178765.name: The Grimoire (Issue 2 - Summer 1979)
rpgissuearticle: Additional Magic Rules for White Bear and Red Moon
At the Sign of the Unicorn
Extensions of the Melee/Wizard Game System
Flying Unit Rules for White Bear and Red Moon
From the 666th Plane of the Abyss
New Independents for White Bear and Red Moon - Fanla the Witch
San Antonio Wargaming Club - Current Membership
SAW Talk: The Empire of Arn Campaign
Suggested Rules Changes in the Melee-Wizard Game System
178765.description:
Expanded from the initial edition, includes coverage on D&D and Melee/Wizard (earliest versions of The Fantasy Trip), and board games.

Includes a few pages of information on the San Antonio Wargaming club, including a 23 April 1979 membership list.

178766.name: Qix Adventure
videogameversion: North American Game Boy Color edition
178766.description:
User Description

This version features a new "Adventure" mode where the player travels a map screen, taking on various opponents which appear on the playing field. Although optional, enclosing this opponent in the box will open a treasure chest, which can also be enclosed, giving the player an item.

178767.name: Godslayer: Banebrood Starter Box
178767.description:
This Banebrood Starter Box contains 6 highly detailed metal miniatures for gamers and collectors.

The enclosed miniatures represent a fully playable warband of 160 points, and in addition you get a printed version of the Quick-Start rules.

With this Banebrood warband and the Quick-Start rules you are able to immediately start playing Godslayer® – the fantasy miniatures skirmish game set in a bronze age world of sword and sorcery.

Get your starter box and start discovering the world of Godslayer®!

Contains:

1x Quick-Start Rules
1x Gorelord model (45mm, metal)
1x Pestbringer model (50mm, metal)
1x Maldire Mongrels Leader model (40mm, metal)
1x Maldire Mongrels Trooper 1 model (40mm, metal)
1x Maldire Mongrels Trooper 2 model (40mm, metal)
1x Maldire Mongrels Trooper 3 model (40mm, metal)
4x 30mm round plastic base
2x 40mm round plastic base
Gorelord profile & item cards
Pestbringer profile & item cards
Maldire Mongrels profile card
Tokens




- The plastic bases are not textured.
- Some modeling is required.

178768.name: World of Mythology
178768.description:
"World of Mythology" is an unpredictable card game in which you play for the gods from ancient mythologies.

There is no odd stuff in the game - playing decks and special cards only!

There are 4 mythologies in the World of Mythology game: Greek, Egyptian, Norse and Slavic.
There are 48 playing cards with gods, 18 special cards and 4 player cards with gods' powers in WOM CLASSIC.

One game round for 4 players lasts about 15 minutes! That's why WOM is a very comfortable way to have an interactive break wherever you are!

Every mythology is presented by 12 gods and goddesses

Greek gods: Zeus (12), Poseidon (11), Hera (10), Hades (9), Ares (8), Athena (7), Hermes (6), Hephaestus (5), Artemis (4), Dionysus (3), Apollo (2), Aphrodite (1).

Egyptian gods: Ra (12), Geb (11), Tefnut (10), Osiris (9), Horus (8), Nephtys (7), Set (6), Anubis (5), Isis (4), Toth (3), Ptah (2), Hathor (1).

Norse gods: Odin (12), Thor (11), Frigg (10), Loki (9), Tyr (8), Hel (7), Heimdall (6), Njord (5), Skadi (4), Forseti (3), Bragi (2), Freyja (1).

Slavic gods: Perun (12), Dazhbog (11), Dodola (10), Veles (9), Triglav (8), Morana (7), Stribog (6), Svarog (5), Vesna (4), Hors (3), Jarilo (2), Lada (1).

Playing cards are really simple and graphic because all detailed information moved to the big player cards. After some days of playing you will easily recognize all powers by gods and icons.
So let's start the game:

1. Every player gets a random player card with a mythology (a trump for that game round) and gods' powers description.

2. All players receive a hand of 4 random cards from the shared deck.

3. Dealer shows a random card from the shared deck to assign a player for the first move.

4. WOM is a circle card game, so every player has to play 1 card per game circle: by beating previous card or dropping his card to opponent's stake.

5. You can beat an opponent's card with a senior card from the same mythology (Zeus with his 12 points beats any Greek card) or with a god from your mythology (your trump) if his armor is strong enough (trump Hera with her 10 points beats gods from other mythologies with their 1 to 12 points).

6. When you play a card from your mythology (your trump), you use its special power automatically. You should read aloud a power description from your player card to all the opponents.

7. The winner of the circle takes all 4 cards to his stake (his earned points deck). But sometimes the winner can lose some cards from his stake due to gods' special powers.

8. All players take 1 card from the shared deck. New circle begins with the previous circle winner's move.

9. The game round ends when the shared deck and playing cards end. It's time to count points from the stake. The winner of the game round becomes a dealer.

10. You can play either by rounds (counting just victories) or by reaching to the exact point level (victory by reaching 500 points, for example).

Every character has a special power and an armor. Powers are based on ancient myths (Zeus beats opponents with a lightning and Thor can use a thunder hammer, for example).

Armor level depends on god's position in adapted mythological hierarchy.
There are gods and goddesses in every mythology whose power is to summon a special card.

There are 3 types of special cards: Wealth, Secret and War. Work on special cards art is still in process, so they will be much more beautiful!

Wealth is a card with bonus points: +10 (6 items), +20 (3 items), +30 (1 item). Available for Apollo (arts), Ptah (arts), Isis (fertility), Bragi (poetry) and Jarilo (fertility).

Secret is a card with a secret combination bonus: "Get +5 points for each Greek card in your stake", for example. Available for Athena (wisdom), Toth (knowledge), Frigg (wisdom) and Vesna (nature).

War is a deck of two cards: Death and Life. It's available for all gods of war: Ares, Horus, Skanda, Tyr and Triglav. If you play the god of war from your mythology, your opponents have to play risky mini game similar to Russian Roulette.

Also in stretching goals we announce great future decks: Hindu gods, Chinese gods, Japanese gods, gods of Mesoamerica, gods of Science, The Outsiders and Good VS. Evil double deck.

178771.name: The Necklace (StarCluster 3)
178771.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Necklace is the thickest part of a gas torus around a neutron star, itself a part of a close binary with a hot F-type star. The gas torus was formed when another gas giant orbiting the neutron star was slowly stripped of its enormous atmosphere. The gasses stayed in a ring, slowly orbiting the neutron star. The torus changed as life spread into it. Life begets oxygen, and oxygen begets life.

The Necklace is the inner, denser part of the gas torus, which is breathable for normal humans and earth animals. There is no hard and fast boundary - the air just gradually gets thinner and thinner. This area is about 20 thousand kilometers in diameter. The entire torus has a thickness diameter of about 2 million kilometers, and an overall diameter of 9 million kilometers.

There is room for a lot of adventures among tree-covered asteroids, and along an artificial River a billion kilometers in diameter, with half sunk asteroids in the river as islands, and all teeming with life.

178772.name: Hecate
178772.description:
From publisher blurb:

"I swear by the black pits of Tartarus that I WILL release the Titans, I WILL claim the throne of Olympus, and I WILL. DEFEAT. JUPITER!"

Hecate (PL 11) is a powerful titan who was raised as the goddess of magic, and who believes she has been wronged at the hands of her adopted father Zeus and passed over in favor of the young goddess Jupiter. She has suffered defeat at Jupiter's hands… but Hecate always has a plan to turn defeat into victory!

178773.name: Holy Vindicator (Legend)
178773.description:
From publisher blurb:

Adventurers encounter all kinds of strange and wonderful things.

In this supplement adventurers will discover the holy assassins: The Holy Vindicators. This mysterious race infiltrates evil hideouts and eliminates dangerous, demonic or undead creatures that threaten the very world.

Included are new racial stats, three new armours, four new weapons, six new heroic abilities and a new cult!

178774.name: Horrors in the Night
178774.description:
From publisher blurb:

Welcome to the new horror rule set by Solace Games!

I first started playing the d6 system when West End Games first published their ever famous space setting going on thirty years ago and fell in love with it.

Since the rules are open content now I decided to use them in my first horror game.

I wanted to maintain the integrity of the rules so the basic rules from the d6 system are unchanged and used as they were originally printed but there is more added.

A new way of creating characters is introduced where you pick first your background, then educataion, your profession and finally any finishing bonuses. There are also a handful of new Advantages to pick from.

The spell and psionic section is much expanded using converted spells and psionics from the d20 system.

As well a detailed sanity system, after all what would a horror setting be without the chance of losing your mind?

A handful of mosters are in the back of the book as well to get you started until I can publish a horror bestiary for everyone to enjoy.

178775.name: Cult of the Eternal Void
178775.description:
From publisher blurb:

Enter the madness of the chaotic void and those that follow and worship it.

The void is a swirling mass of chaos where madness inducing creatures live and plot to eventually take over the known world. Powerful gods are worshipped that slowly send their agents into our world to corrupt and twist the essence of the very fleshy fabric of all mortals.

Luckily they cannot just enter into our world at will, but unfortunately they have to corrupt mortal flesh to do so.

A large cult exists that worships the void and seeks to gain its end goal of world domination. The four branches of the cult make up factions all unto themselves but many of the front and public factions put on an air of goodness to fool others and bring the public into the fold so they can further the will of the void.

In this product you will find:

5 new backgrounds
13 new professions
4 new factions that can be expanded to create numerous different factions
14 new divine spells
10 new sorcery spells
A new type of magic called void magic with 58 starting spells!
Also full conversion rules for the most popular d100 games on the market today!




Delve into the madness of the void and see what crawls out...

178776.name: Creature of the Week: Death Bull (Pathfinder)
178776.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Death Bull is an undead minotaur that has taken on the curse of undeath in a quest for power. Using the full arsenal of weapons they can cause a lot of mayhem on the battlefield as they can cause fear and chaos all around an enemy.

Make sure you pass that Perception check, that isn't just any regular minotaur approaching you!

178777.name: Creature of the Week: Death Bull (Legend)
178777.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Death Bull is an undead minotaur that has taken on the curse of undeath in a quest for power. Using the full arsenal of weapons they can cause a lot of mayhem on the battlefield as they can cause fear and chaos all around an enemy.

Make sure you pass that Perception check, that isn't just any regular minotaur approaching you!

178778.name: Alice's Adventures in Wonderland
178778.description:
From publisher blurb:

Ever wanted to go to Wonderland? Well, you can't... but you can help Alice navigate her way through Lewis Carroll's weird imaginings and rewrite a famous fiction! Things are never quite as they seem, are they?

What an excellent way to read a classic, whether for the first time or as a nostalgia trip dowm memory lane.

Alice is waiting by the riverbank...

178779.name: Alternate Archetypes, Thunderstriker
178779.description:
From publisher blurb:

This issue introduces a four new archetypes based on the fighter's thunderstriker archetype. The Bulwork Brawler is an archetype for the Barbarian core class, the Eldritch Ward is a magus archetype, the Hooliganis a rogue archetype, and the Nature Warden is a range archetype. each archetype is heavily influenced by the class abilities granted by the fighter's archetype for all things buckler. In addition several new alternate combat feats are introduced involving the buckler and two new buckler types.

178780.name: Blackmail
178780.description:
From publisher blurb:

Das Showgeschäft bietet die Möglichkeit, Unmengen von Geld zu verdienen. Was man dafür benötigt ist ein Star, den man vermarkten kann.

„Wir sind ins Showgeschäft eingestiegen. Dieser Schwanzlutscher Darrel Frazer und sein verschissener Manager gehören uns. In zwei Monaten sollen die Dreharbeiten zu einem Blockbuster beginnen. Es ist ziemlich sicher, dass der Film eine riesige Menge Geld abwerfen wird … es gibt aber ein Problem“

Um eine Schuld zu begleichen, musste der Manager John Reacon etwas von seinem Kuchenstück abgeben. Er hat ein paar Personen zu stillen Teilhabern gemacht. Es stellt sich leider heraus, dass sein Star Darrel Frazer wesentlich mehr als nur das übliche Drogenproblem hat. Ein Erpresser verlangt Geld für kompromittierende Fotos. Sollten die Bilder an die Öffentlichkeit gelangen, bedeuten sie das Ende des Stars. Für die stillen Teilhaber ist die Gefährdung ihrer Investitionen nicht akzeptabel. Jemand muss den Erpresser finden und dauerhaft zum Schweigen bringen!

„Ihr sollt nach Miami fliegen und euch den Erpresser schnappen. Nehmt ihm alle Fotos ab. Vernichtet alles und lasst den Wichser für immer verschwinden. Von dem Mist darf nichts in die Presse kommen!“

Die Erpressung ist erst der Anfang. In einem Rennen gegen die Zeit müssen die Charaktere mit Prostituierten, Drogenhändlern, Selbstmördern und skrupellosen Gewaltverbrechern fertig werden um das Leben von Darrel Frazer zu retten.

Bei diesem Szenario handelt es sich um einen modernen Crime-Thriller ohne übernatürliche Elemente.


Translation courtesy of Google:

The show business offers the opportunity to earn loads of money. What is needed for a star, can be marketed.

"We have entered into show business. This cocksucker Darrel Frazer and his verschissener Manager belong to us. In two months, to begin shooting a blockbuster. It is quite certain that the film will throw a huge amount of money ... but there is a problem "

To settle a debt, had to give up some of his cake piece of Manager John Reacon. He has made a few people to his silent partners. It turns out, unfortunately, that his Star Darrel Frazer much more than just the usual drug problem. A blackmailer demands money for compromising photos. If the images reach the public, they mean the end of the Stars. For the silent partner, the risk of their investments is not acceptable. Someone needs to find the blackmailer and bring permanently silenced!

"You shall fly to Miami and you catch the blackmailer. Take him from all photos. Destroy everything and let the motherfucker disappear forever. From the manure must not come to the press! "

The blackmail is just the beginning. In a race against time, the characters with prostitutes, drug dealers, suicides and unscrupulous violent criminals must be done to save the life of Darrel Frazer.

In this scenario, it is a modern crime thriller with no supernatural elements.

178781.name: Pikes Creek (OpenD6)
178781.description:
From publisher blurb:

Pikes Creek orientiert sich an Filmen wie „8mm“, „The Flock“ und „Among the Tombstones“. Es ist ein moderner Snuff-Thriller ohne übernatürliche Elemente.

Gemeinsam suchen die Charaktere nach einem 16 jährigen Mädchen. Ihre Nachforschungen konfrontieren sie mit Perversion, Gier und rücksichtsloser Brutalität. Werden sie selbst zu menschlichen Monstern und verlieren Werte wie Moral, Gesetz und Mitleid ihre Bedeutung?

Sexueller Missbrauch, Gewalt, Sadismus, Sucht und Geldgier spielen eine zentrale Rolle in dem Abenteuer. Es ist NICHT für Personen unter 18 Jahren geeignet.


Translation courtesy of Google:

Pikes Creek based on films such as "8mm", "The Flock" and "Among the Tombstones". It is a modern Snuff thriller without supernatural elements.

Together the characters search for a 16 year old girl. Your inquiry confront them with perversion, greed and ruthless brutality. Are they themselves to human monsters and lose values ​​such as morality, law and pity their meaning?

Sexual abuse, violence, sadism, addiction and greed play a central role in the adventure. It is not suitable for people under 18 years.

178782.name: Pikes Creek (D20 Modern)
178782.description:
From publisher blurb:

Pikes Creek orientiert sich an Filmen wie „8mm“, „The Flock“ und „Among the Tombstones“. Es ist ein moderner Snuff-Thriller ohne übernatürliche Elemente.

Gemeinsam suchen die Charaktere nach einem 16 jährigen Mädchen. Ihre Nachforschungen konfrontieren sie mit Perversion, Gier und rücksichtsloser Brutalität. Werden sie selbst zu menschlichen Monstern und verlieren Werte wie Moral, Gesetz und Mitleid ihre Bedeutung?

Sexueller Missbrauch, Gewalt, Sadismus, Sucht und Geldgier spielen eine zentrale Rolle in dem Abenteuer. Es ist NICHT für Personen unter 18 Jahren geeignet.


Translation courtesy of Google:

Pikes Creek based on films such as "8mm", "The Flock" and "Among the Tombstones". It is a modern Snuff thriller without supernatural elements.

Together the characters search for a 16 year old girl. Your inquiry confront them with perversion, greed and ruthless brutality. Are they themselves to human monsters and lose values ​​such as morality, law and pity their meaning?

Sexual abuse, violence, sadism, addiction and greed play a central role in the adventure. It is not suitable for people under 18 years.

178783.name: Twin Pikes Motel
178783.description:
From publisher blurb:

Twin Pikes ist eine kleine Stadt in Texas, am Rande der Chihuahua-Wüste. Die Straße nach Twin Pikes biegt von der Bundesstraße 118 ab, welche von Fort Davis nach Alpine durch die Wüste führt.

In einem heruntergekommenen Motel vor der Stadt kommt es zu einem schicksalhaften Treffen. Jeder der Gäste verfolgt seine eigene Agenda, um an sein Ziel zu kommen. Ziele für die sie über Leichen gehen würden.

„Kann mir BITTE jemand erklären, warum ein toter Priester im Pool schwimmt, die Gastanks explodiert sind, ein Perverser auf dem Parkplatz herumrennt und vor allem, wo mein verdammtes Heroin geblieben ist!“
– Sheriff Homer Arck

Twin Pikes Motel ist ein rasantes und ungewöhnliches Rollenspielszenario, bei dem der Handlungsablauf von den Charakteren getragen wird und das während des Spiels immer rasanter und spektakulärer eskaliert.

Das Szenario beinhaltet:

Einen ausgearbeiteten Handlungsort
Komplett ausgearbeitete Charaktere für bis zu 8 Spieler
Empfehlungen zur Moderation des Szenarios
Optionen, um die Situation weiter zuzuspitzen!!!





Translation courtesy of Google:

Twin Pikes is a small town in Texas, on the edge of the Chihuahuan Desert. The road to Twin Pikes turns from the main road 118, which runs from Fort Davis to Alpine through the desert.

In a run-down motel outside the city there is a fateful meeting. Each of the guests followed his own agenda to get to its destination. Objectives for which they would stop at nothing.

"Can someone please explain why a dead priest swims in the pool, the gas tank exploded, a pervert running around in the parking lot and especially where my fucking heroin has remained!"
– Sheriff Homer Arck

Twin Pikes Motel is a fast-paced and unusual RPG scenario in which the course of action is supported by the characters and the escalated ever faster and more spectacular during the game.

The scenario includes:

An elaborate Handlungsort
Fully drawn characters for up to 8 players
Recommendations for facilitation of the scenario
Options to further sharpen the situation !!!

178784.name: No Quarter (Issue 57 - Nov 2014)
rpgissuearticle: Battle Report: Beauty and the Beast Handlers
Corvis Codex: Scars of the Scourge
Gen Con Formula P3 Competition Winners
Quick Shot Scenario: Immortality Part V
The Gavyn Kyle Files: Servath Reznik
Tournament Triple Threat: Retribution of Scyrah
Warmachine: Tactics - From Tabletop to the Computer
rpg: Iron Kingdoms Full Metal Fantasy Roleplaying Game
178784.description: Published simultaneously in print, PDF, and electronic formats. Contents of all formats identical.

rpg: Medieval: Adventures in a Foreign Land
178785.name: Medieval: Adventures in a Foreign Land
178785.description:
Publisher's description:

MEDIEVAL is an independently written and produced role playing game, strongly influenced by a medieval-European theme, and game play that is intuitive, gritty and fun. MEDIEVAL can be played with as few as two people, but the optimum group size is 4-6. MEDIEVAL uses a skill point-buy system, eschewing level and class restrictions.

The combat system is unique, emphasizing strategic and tactical cooperation and planning, and allows players to customize characters’ active offensive and defensive skills. With MEDIEVAL, no longer is combat static and confined to turn-based rounds, but unfolds dynamically and fluidly using a unique system of simultaneous resolution of outcomes.

MEDIEVAL'S magic system also breaks the conventional mold of spell restrictions by level and class. Players choose and design any power they can imagine, adjusting the effectiveness of each power to suit a character’s needs.

178786.name: Crosswords Plus
178786.description:
The Crosswords Plus game features over 1,000 professionally designed crossword puzzles at a variety of difficulty levels — perfect for everyone from budding word gurus to crossword masters. A number of other fun and challenging word games are also included, making for an excellent package that any crossword lover will enjoy.

A number of other fun and challenging word games are also included, making for an excellent package that any crossword lover will enjoy.

Source: The Publisher Website.

178787.name: The Description System
178787.description:
From the introduction:

The Description System is a roleplaying system that, rather than character sheets and statistics,uses a description of characters, elements, challenges, monsters and everything else in its place. Everything in the game is described as it would be described in a book and it is this description – in particular the adjectives – that determine how good your character is at one thing or the other.

178788.name: No Quarter (Issue 58 - Jan 2015)
rpgissuearticle: Level 7 [Invasion] Soften the Blow or Raise the Stakes
Quick Shot Scenario: Immortality Part VI
Scoundrels & Sell-Swords: Ilena, the Beast of the North
The Gavyn Kyle Files: Fiona the Black
Tournament Triple Threat: The Butcher's Block
rpg: Iron Kingdoms Full Metal Fantasy Roleplaying Game
178788.description:
Published simultaneously in print, PDF, and electronic formats. Contents of all formats identical.


user and admin comment

Note: the cover erroneously gives the publication date of November 2015.
this entry has been added to the database in June 2015

the title has been changed to No Quarter (Issue 58 - Jan 2015)

178789.name: Boiling Point
178789.description:
From publisher blurb:

Boiling Point is an adventure for the Base Raiders superhero RPG a FATE system game. Alien Shark Warriors threaten to invade the Earth from a secret portal under the ocean. Find it before it’s too late!

It begins with an investigation of a new drug dealer. Lukas has been selling super soldier drugs acquired from a mysterious base. The player characters are asked to find the base by finding Lukas. The base was the underwater home of a superhero named Hot Water, who disappeared over a year ago. He left behind a treasure trove of gadgets and a portal to another universe. A race of alien shark warriors has escaped from the portal. So far, they are trapped in the base, but that won’t last long. The heroes will need to find the base and stop the aliens before it’s too late.

Boiling Point mixes investigation, exploration, combat, and social conflicts for a perfect blend of excitement and fun. It can be used as a first time adventure for players new to the system, part of an ongoing campaign, or as a one shot. It contains new enemies, allies, superpowers, loot, and more.

178790.name: Starship Bridge 02
178790.description:
From publisher blurb:

This product is a full-color, 16 inch by 20 inch, floor plan of a SciFi Bridge, with Hex, Square and No overlay.

The PDF includes includes the VTT (Virtual Table Top Images for online play).

“The captain is acting strangely since his return from leave. In addition, he is refusing medical and psychological evaluations. I am at a loss of what to do at this point.” —Medical Officer Evelyn

Starship Bridge 2 is a small interior map of a starship bridge and a captain’s quarters. This bridge has enough computer stations and chairs for four personnel.

Starship Bridge 2 is intended for near or far future science fiction games.

Adventure idea for this map:

Extended Leave: Starship Captain Bradley came back from leave seemingly refreshed and invigorated, but his decision making and mental capacity seem diminished. His usual reserved demeanor has been changed to an emotional and temperamental one. The captain refuses to be tested by the medical officer for physical or psychological impairments. The captain also refuses to allow anyone into his private quarters for any reason.

The crew must decide what to do. Do they continue to follow a man whose orders continue to befuddle them? Do they mutiny against their long time captain?

What is the truth about the captain’s change in behavior? Has the captain been replaced by a clone? A shapeshifter? An android capable of emotion? Has the captain been drugged instead?

If the captain has been replaced and the crew subdues the doppler, they find the real captain in his quarters.

178791.name: No Quarter (Issue 59 - Mar 2015)
rpgissuearticle: Editorial: No Quarter's Milestone in Publishing
Foundry, Forge & Crucible: The Tools of Espionage
Ten Years of Hordes: A Decade in the Wilds
rpg: Iron Kingdoms Full Metal Fantasy Roleplaying Game
178791.description: Published simultaneously in print, PDF, and electronic formats. Contents of all formats identical.

178793.name: No Quarter (Issue 60 - May 2015)
rpgissuearticle: Modeling & Painting: Major Prime Victoria Haley
Nerves of Steel: An Interview with Miles Holmes
The Art of Cosplay: Allie Rose-Marie Leost
The Art of Cosplay: Marisha Ray
The First Anniversary of Privateer Pins
The Gavyn Kyle Files: Vinter Raelthorne IV
Unleashed: Chasing the Dragon, Part One
rpg: Iron Kingdoms Full Metal Fantasy Roleplaying Game
178793.description:
Published simultaneously in print, PDF, and electronic formats. Contents of all formats identical.

10th Anniversary Edition

Cover date shows March 2015.

178794.name: Aesir
178794.description:
Publisher's description:

What if ...


There was finally a roleplaying game that had no limits?
There was finally a game that gave you total freedom?
There was a roleplaying game that allowed you shape your own character?
There was finally a roleplaying game that put you in control of your character
There was an RPG with rules based upon logic and ease of play?
There was finally a game that concentrated on the game and not the rules?
There was a game based upon WHAT IF..


Aesir ™ is an exhilarating swords and sorcery roleplaying game set in a realistic Dark Ages that never was.

Based on a few linear concepts the mechanics are uniform and easy to learn and open ended so the only limits are your imagination and guile.

Merging the printed word with the power of the internet, Aesir is a new concept in role playing games that gives you access to ALL supplemental material, updates, and more with your purchase. No more buying constant updates. No more restrictions and contradictions. Aesir gives you the thrill of heroic fantasy adventure with the freedom of choice that you deserve!

178795.name: No Quarter (Issue X - Jan 2011)
rpgissuearticle: Battle Report: Battle of Black River Bridge
The Gavyn Kyle Files: Alexia Ciannor
178795.description:
Special Edition - "Celebrating Ten Years of Privateer Press"
On the cover: "Sally Turns Ten" by Neil Roberts

178796.name: Naval Battle
178796.description:
Naval Battle in a fantasy world!

Especially for the youngest fairy tales and adventures admirers we present 'Naval Battle'. 2-sided map of fantastic marine world + color models of the ships = Real Sea Chess for your Kids!

Players engage in a struggle for supremacy over the sea. Each player has four ships:
1) the mighty Battleship,
2) multi-gun Galleon,
3) fast Frigate and
4) nimble small Brig.

Ships can move around the playing board and shoot. To win the game, the player must either drown the opponent’s Flagship (Battleship), or capture the enemy base.

Ships miniatures in the Naval battle are equivalent for the Admiral game miniatures.

2 sided board increases variety of the game.

178798.name: THE IDOLM@STER Cinderella Girls: Idol Produce Deck Set "Cinderella Stage"
178798.description:
Based on the anime adaptation of Japanese mobile phone game "THE iDOLM@STER CINDERELLA GIRLS". Player take the role of producer of group of pop idols, your goal is to make them reach stardom.

This is one of deck building game which each player have to have their own deck. There are three set: pink(cute), blue(cool) and orange(passion), which represent character type from original mobile game. You buy a card, play various cards to collect mission and first player to earn 10 victory points win the game.

Let's make these girls successful!!

178799.name: The Forest: The Manticore Legend
178799.description:
The merciless battle between Powers of Light and Darkness started in the old times. Powers of darkness retreated, but it was just a temporary respite.

Be prepared for the full battle with the Manticore! Investigate the forest and construct roads to the magical armor and amulets. Monsters – servants of darkness – will hinder you. Time is limited: as soon as magical fetters are off, the monster will start his fire path to the Castle in order to become the Absolute Lord of the Forest. Don’t waste a minute: find the artifacts that are the only chance for a victory.

Two variants of the game: team-play against the Manticore (against the system) where the team either together wins or loose; and individual game face-to-face with the Monster.

The legend returns!

ESSENCE OF THE GAME:

Players begin their journey in the Forest world of the City which is soon to undergo an invasion of the awakened Manticore. At first the players should find their way into the abandoned workshops and places of power around the City – where they will be able to acquire weapons and artifacts that enhance certain characteristics of the hero. Pathfinding is carried out with laying on the board of tiles depicting the road. Each of the players paves the way for their own, but can also use the road paved by other players. Some tiles contain a monster - if a player has laid out such tile, then a monster token is placed. Player may try to circumvent a monster, but may also fight him.

After all the tiles are exhausted, the Manticore awakens and begins moving in the direction of the City. If the Manticore reaches the City - all the players loose the game, so the task of the Players is to defeat the Manticore before her arrival in the City.

Battle with monsters and with the Manticore is made with a die roll. However, in addition, there are also random battle cards that determine what type of attack (magic, melee, shooting) is used in this round of the fight (see ‘Conducting a fight’). Card is opened blindly, and can bring a pleasant surprise (attack with the most developed hero’s skill) or not pleasant. This encourages players to improve different abilities of their heroes.

178800.name: EarthNight
178800.description:
UNRELEASED GAME – UNAVAILABLE




This game has officially been announced by the publisher or developer, but has not yet been released and made available for purchase. Therefore some of the information above may change in the future. Until this game is released, please do not submit images for it, nor add new releases. Press Kits are an exception and a maximum of six can be added.




Dragons have taken over the Earth

It's up to a 14 year old high-schooler and an unemployed photographer to stop them.

EarthNight is a hand-painted runner about the dragon apocalypse featuring hand designed procedurally generated levels.

Source: The Developer Website.

178802.name: Kockatoo
178802.description:
How do a pig sound? A zebra? A saw? A gardner? In Kockatoo you need to be good at making sounds, so others can guess which card you're holding. You need to sit on your hands, so you can't use hands and feet to mime.

One player takes a card from the stack, and tries to make the sound. The other players have to guess among the 30 cards visible on the table. But be careful! You only have one guess per round. The one who guesses correctly and the sound maker gets one point. if no one guesses correctly then no gets point.

As the play goes on, the options are limited, so the games get easier, so you need to be very fast in the end.

178804.name: Where the Shadows Stalk
178804.description: Un message désespéré de l'un de vos vieux amis vous supplie de vous rendre sans tarder au nord du Pays de Galle, dans une vallée retirée où se déroulent d'effroyables événements qui défient les lois de la science et de la raison. Dans cette contrée, les vivants sont la proie des morts; les galeries d'une mine désaffectée sont hantées par d'innommables entités et, dans le village proche, des forces maléfiques ont privé les habitants de leur âme et de leur volonté. Une très ancienne prophétie est sur le point de se réaliser... Et c'est à vous de débarrasser la Vallée de l'Horreur qui en a pris possession.

178805.name: Anna & Elsa
178805.description:
Very simple game based on Disney's Frozen. Main goal is to get to the castle of Elsa, princess who froze the whole kingdom of Arendelle. By throwing dice, you move your meeple, possibly stepping on fields with special effects such as "wait one turn" or "move four fields forward". The player who first reaches frozen castle wins.

From the back of the box:
Join the rescue expedition on behalf of Arendelle Kingdom. Princess Anna and her friends try to overcome many pitfalls and obstacles on the journey to safe [sic] her sister Elsa and whole Kingdom. What will win ice or live?

178806.name: Issel Warrior King
178806.description:
Au plus profond de la sombre Forêt des Gémissements, bien au-delà des terres habitées, se cache la Clairière des Rêves. C'est là - si ce lieu mystérieux n'est pas une légende - que vous pourrez accomplir la mission que le vieux Mahântor, votre maître d'armes, vous a fait jurer de mener à bien: reconquérir le trône de Franzos, usurpé par le baron Théo. Sur votre route, vous rencontrerez Darian le Magicien, lui aussi à la recherche de la Clairière des Rêves. Il sera votre fidèle allié... à moins qu'il n'ait secrètement résolu de vous trahir?


Seul ou à deux, chacun muni de son propre livre et armé d'un crayon et d'une gomme, c'est de VOUS que dépend le sort d'Issel... et aussi celui de Darian!

178807.name: Roleplaying is Magic (Season Four Edition)
178807.description:
From website:

Fillies and gentlecolts, Equestrians of all ages: Welcome to the Season Four Edition of Roleplaying is Magic!

If you’re one of the many returning players who have been with us since the beginning of this project, we’d like to begin by saying thank you. Your love and support over the last several years has been essential in turning this from a humble collection of notes and ideas into one of the Brony community’s most popular and longest-running game projects. We couldn’t have done any of this without you.

And if you’re new to Roleplaying is Magic, we’d like to begin by saying welcome! Sit back and relax; we think you’ll enjoy reading this book and playing this game as much as we’ve enjoyed creating them.

You may be wondering, "Just what is Roleplaying is Magic, anyway?" In a nutshell, Roleplaying is Magic (or "RiM" for short) is a fan-created tabletop roleplaying game and storytelling system based on the My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic cartoon series created by Lauren Faust and owned by Hasbro Inc. With it, up to six players and one Game Master (or "GM") can have adventures in the magical land of Equestria, creating their own stories together and exploring the magic of friendship.

RiM is suitable for a wide variety of gamers, striving for mechanical simplicity to appeal to beginners and immersion-oriented roleplayers, as well as enough depth and complexity to satisfy veteran gamers. It emphasizes positive themes of cooperation, courage, integrity, and self-expression, to provide a meaningful experience in line with the themes and aesthetics of the original cartoon series.

RiM is not just for grown-up gamers, or hardcore tabletop players; we’ve done our best to create a roleplaying game that parents, children, and siblings can all enjoy, with old friends or making new ones!

The guiding phrase of Roleplaying is Magic is, "Canon focused, fanon friendly." This means that while we’ve tried to stay as true to the original cartoon series as possible, we’ve also left plenty of wiggle room for game groups to make their experiences unique; to make their Equestria truly their own.

A new edition of RiM has been produced after each season of the original cartoon series, to incorporate revised information presented by the series, as well as improve the design of the game in an effort to make it the best it can be. With this final 'official' version, the Season Four Edition (or "S4E" for short), RiM has never been better. Now even more streamlined and customizable than ever before, S4E blends previous attempts at simplification with robust gameplay mechanics and a focus on positive ethics and morality.

178808.name: Kung Fury: Street Rage
178808.description:
User Summary

Kung Fury: Street Rage is a beat 'em up game based on the movie Kung Fury. Attack left and right with precise timing to fight off waves of Nazis.

178809.name: Picket
178809.description:
From publisher blurb:

This product is a little booklet of a Traveller compatible vehicle. The vehicle introduced in this installment of the series is the Picket, a hovercraft providing a good mix of speed, armour and armament.

The PDF contains the background of the vehicle and statistics for its use as well as illustrations.

rpgseries: Far Away Land RPG Adventure Module
178810.name: Outpost Knoll
178810.description:
From publisher blurb:

Prepare for a wide-open, sandbox adventure as you and your party make the outpost of Knoll your base of operations. Then, venture forth and take on brigands, clown plant hybrids, angry goabs and their merciless ogra leader, a garl snail with a mindless horde, and traitors within the walls of the outpost. Adventure awaits!

This adventures module has four full-color maps of adventure related areas (like the Lair of Islivious). It features a bunch of NPCs and all kinds of ideas to help flesh out the scenario included in the module. Like all of our adventure modules, this one can be thrown into an already on-going campaign allowing your group to pick and choose which aspects to use.

178811.name: Trinity Stone Academy
178811.description:
From publisher blurb:

Howdy , Hola and Hello…. Welcome to the south.

The South isn’t like the North. Centuries of different cultural influences, different sides of wars and a different mentality has created something unique. So unique in fact it might as well be a whole other country and for a time it was.

Magic in the south is taught a little different too,. The influence of Latin America , Africa and France are stronger her and that mixing of cultures is why Trinity Stone is one of the more unique schools of magic. A school where hard work and gentle southern civility are the norm .

Trinity Stone Academy brings a unique magical school to life for Stars and Directors. In the south you’ll find new skills, traits, monsters and more as well as the magical culture of the south centering around Noir Arbre Lousiana. And the mystical realm of the Spirit valley.

178812.name: Crossover
178812.description:
From publisher blurb:

Time to assemble your heroes, put on your costumes and fight some crime!

Crossover brings to the world of Witch Girls not only Superheroes but a world full of them sitting on the other side of the reality wall.

178813.name: Alien Elves
178813.description:
From publisher blurb:

You knew you never should have stepped through that stone portal. One moment you’re bravely travelling through the universe in an advanced spacecraft, the next you are stranded in a strange world of swords and magic. Still, you have found many noble causes to fight for in this “primitive” age. All the while, you hope to find a way back to your home in the space-time continuum.

This new character class can be used with Labyrinth Lord and other old school games.

You get:

A full character class description (including new special abilities)
Helpful charts to take your Alien Elf from level 1 to level 10
Suggestions for incorporating Alien Elves into your campaign
Pregenerated characters at first and third level. Just print and play (or use them as NPC’s)

178814.name: Space Amazons
178814.description:
From publisher blurb:

Another Racial Class for your Old School Space Opera campaigns. Includes two classes: The Space Amazon Valkrie and The Reverend Sister. Plus the Space Amazon Heavy Fighter and more.

Compatible with White Star: White Box Science Fiction Roleyplaying by Barrel Rider Games.

178815.name: Starships of Shade Space Vol. 1
178815.description:
From publisher blurb:

A bevy of ships to light up the darkness of space in your OSR/Whitebox and specifically White Star campaigns. First in a series of books detailing the hyper dimensional space known to star-farers near and far as SHADE SPACE.

178816.name: Marketplaces W-Z
178816.description:
From publisher blurb:

We have finally reached the end of our series. This one is Pay What You Want for those who haven't taken a look at any of the previous ones yet and are curious.

Herein we provide 4 new shop locations that can be used in any fantasy setting. Each is distinctive and different from a standard shop. They also include several adventure ideas and a table inspired by the location. This article showcases a wagon shop, a scholar, a library and a candle shop. These are good for several nights of adventure or as an interesting location the characters are passing through.

178817.name: Heart of Diamonds
178817.description:
From publisher blurb:

Heralds of an ancient time, these ponies are charged by destiny to be a beacon of hope and inspiration for those around them as they make their impression on the world.

New feats, spells, alchemic discoveries, and equipment all designed for gem ponies!

178818.name: Zauberer
178818.description:
From publisher blurb:

Unleash the zauberer upon your foes (or upon your players). The zauberer is a master of sword and sorcery. They can spontaneously cast spells as well as deliver them through their weapons. As they develop their arcane abilities, ancient bloodlines awaken within them, to grant them additional abilities.

Zauberers learn to use even the heaviest of armors without chance of failing casting their arcane spells. In addition, they learn how to use ranged spells as melee spells to deliver them through their weapon effortlessly.

A new hybrid class brought to you by ARMR Studios.

178819.name: Long Since Severed are Ties with the Sky
178819.description:
From publisher blurb:

A riven plain. Its heath lies split beneath the snaking fall of a great tether, now a sinuous ridge amid the ruin. Survivors linger glinting in silken slopes while flayers claim nigh unbreakable fibres.

Condensed to one page for slipping in among other materials, this sandbox-oriented content is intended as an easily absorbed framework for improvisation to be adapted by the user as preferred for a wider setting and specific system.

It presents core ideas and key numbers to fall back on, with general approaches that can be applied in other situations.

The content covers map generation on the fly for an abstracted plain as well as suggestions for aspects of the locality, including groups present, a large complex, tether structure, pod loads and a possible replacement.

The spaces could be detailed using Elaboration: Structure & Surface, possibly Being: More or Less Fantastical Olde Worlde Technologies, and maybe Narrative: Abandoned Space.

boardgameintegration: Shadows of Brimstone: Cynder Artifacts Supplement
Shadows of Brimstone: Cynder Artifacts Supplement
178820.description:
The Caverns of Cynder is a hostile Alien World, deep underground and overflowing with lakes of molten magma! There is some alien architecture such as pathways and ductwork to funnel the lava in practical and ceremonial ways. In the Caverns, Dark Stone is melted into the magma itself and can be found in liquid form! This has led some industrious explorers, both human and otherwise, to set up mining equipment in an attempt to siphon it out of the rock itself. Of course the Heroes must always beware of the foul creatures lurking the corridors as well as those that will rise up out of the molten rock itself to attack — not to mention the constant threat of eruptions and rising lava pools at your feet!

Shadows of Brimstone: Caverns of Cynder Expansion offers a new Otherworld for players to explore, with a set of 18 new double-sided map tiles. There are new Encounter cards, artifacts, Otherworld threats, and map cards, as well as three of the new lava men Enemy.

Cynder Tiles include a mechanism in which you can take damage if you pass over certain fiery spaces. If you have a high Agility you get to roll two dice, so swift and nimble characters are less likely to burn. Cynder also has mechanisms in which Clothing items make you susceptible to heat exhaustion and burning, so there's some interesting decisions to be made about how many items to keep equipped from turn to turn.
178820.name: Shadows of Brimstone: Caverns of Cynder Expansion
boardgamepodcastepisode: GenCon 2015 - Flying Frog Productions

178821.name: Festung Europa
178821.description:
From the back of the book:
I cieli europei sono solcati da lampi di fuoco e squassati dal tuono delle armi e degli sconti fra i meta-umani.

English translation:
The European skies are crossed by flashes of fire and shaken by the thunder of the weapons and the clashes between the meta-humans.

178822.name: Mare Nostrum
178822.description:
From the publisher website:
La terza espansione per Project H.O.P.E. contiene una descrizione dettagliata dello scenario bellico del Mediterraneo e del Nord Africa, due nuove classi di Personaggi e nuovi PNG.

English translation:
The third expansion for Project H.O.P.E. contains a detailed description of the scenario of war in the Mediterranean and North Africa, two new classes of characters and new NPCs.

178824.name: Silver Age
178824.description:
From the publisher website:
Silver Age è l’attesissima espansione per Project H.O.P.E.
che non solo introduce una nuova ambientazione per le avventure dei Meta-Umani, ma anche nuove regole.

English translation:
Silver Age is the highly anticipated expansion for Project HOPE
which not only introduces a new setting for the adventures of the Meta-Human, but also new rules.

178825.name: Hana-Bi: Atto II
178825.description:
From the publisher website:
Secondo modulo conclusivo per Project H.O.P.E.

English translation:
Secon volume of the final module for Project H.O.P.E.

178826.description:
Grave Robbers from Outer Space the Resurrected Edition (GROS:RE) is a reboot of the original B-movie card game, Grave Robbers from Outer Space (GROS).
Back from the dead, with a new layout and art, GROS:RE introduces new gameplay elements to the classic game.
GROS:RE is a strategy card game for 2-6 players. Players are competing to complete the "best" b-movie. Characters and props add to the value of a player's movie, while locations may add or subtract depending on the location in question. FX cards do all manner of different things. Creature cards are used to attck an opponent's movie in an effort to kill off characters.
Cards have a cost to play (anywhere from 0-3 "popcorn"), and some cards generate popcorn. If a player can't afford the cost of a new card by using their cards in play, additional popcorn can be generated by discarding cards from hand. The popcorn mechanic makes players decide between playing a card to do something now, or holding onto it to pay for something later.
178826.name: Grave Robbers from Outer Space Resurrected Edition

178827.name: Missione: Cavallo di Troia
178827.description:
From the publisher website:
Avventura della serie "Diari di Guerra" per Project H.O.P.E.

English translation:
Adventure from the series "War Diary" for Project HOPE

178828.name: Sulle Orme di una Leggenda
178828.description:
From the publisher website:
Avventura ufficiale del primo torneo nazionale di PRoject H.O.P.E. della serie "Le Cronache di Project H.O.P.E."

English translation:
Official adventure of the first national tournament of Project HOPE, from the series "The Chronicles of Project H.O.P.E."

178829.name: Missione: A Caccia di Tigri
178829.description:
From the publisher website:
Avventura della serie "Diari di Guerra" per Project H.O.P.E.

English translation:
Adventure from the series "War Diary" for Project HOPE

178830.name: Bear a Grudge
178830.description:
UNLICENSED GAME




This game is an unlicensed version of Space Harrier.




User Summary

Bear a Grudge is a game for ZX Spectrum. The game is a clone of the arcade game Space Harrier. But here you don't fly around as a human, but as a bear, trying to complete the different levels, and score high points. There is no bosses in the game.

178831.name: Shadows of Madness (Pathfinder)
178831.description:
From publisher blurb:

For 4-6 Characters of Levels 6-7

Many years ago Tibor, a wizard with an overwhelming desire for knowledge of the plane of shadow, locked himself away in a tower to pursue his studies.

Shortly thereafter, his tower was consumed in a dark explosion, and the mage was assumed dead. However, assumption can never be taken as fact, and now the PCs have stumbled upon a hidden stairway where the tower once stood, leading down into the shadowy earth below...

178832.name: Neotomas' Paradise (Pathfinder)
178832.description:
From publisher blurb:

For 3-4 Characters of Levels 3-4

Recently, the homeless of the city have begun to disappear. Few seem to care, and many are actually happy to see them gone. The local magistrate is not however, and wants these disappearances looked into. Rumors have circulated that under the cover of night someone, or something, has been seen descending into the sewers below the market district via a grate in the street. The magistrate has tasked the PCs with investigating the sewers to see if any clues can be found relating to the recent disappearances.

178833.name: Runes of Brennos
178833.description:
User Summary

By defeating other druids in magical combat, you spread your power across ancient France. You face off across a narrow corridor, sending a variety of spells at each other by using the mouse to click and move in certain simple directions. Spells can be sent as attacks but also as counters to the other druid's spells.

178834.name: XCOM 2
videogamehonor: 2016 CVA Best International Game of the Year Nominee
2016 Global Game Awards Best Sci-fi Game of the Year Nominee
2016 Global Game Awards Best Strategy Game of the Year Nominee
2016 Global Game Awards Game of the Year Nominee
2016 Golden Geek Best PC Game Runner Up
2016 Golden Geek Best Video Game Visuals/Artwork Nominee
2016 Golden Geek Most Innovative Video Game Nominee
2016 Golden Geek Video Game of the Year Runner Up
2016 Golden Joystick Best PC Game of the Year Nominee
2016 Golden Joystick Game of the Year Nominee
2016 The Game Awards Best Strategy Game of the Year Nominee
2017 D.I.C.E. Best Strategy/Simulation Game of the Year Nominee
178834.description:
XCOM 2 transports players 20 years into the future, where humanity lost the war against the alien threat that has established a new world order. The secret paramilitary organization known as XCOM is largely forgotten, and must strike back to reclaim control of Earth and free mankind from the aliens’ rule.

In XCOM 2, the roles have been reversed, and XCOM is now the invading force. They are hampered by limited resources and must constantly evade the alien threat in their new mobile headquarters. Players must use a combination of firepower and stealth-like tactics to help XCOM recruit soldiers and build a resistance network, while attempting to expose the evil alien agenda and save humanity. XCOM 2 will introduce gameplay features such as procedurally-generated levels, which will make each experience unique to the player, as well as offer a much deeper level of modding support. Additionally, XCOM 2 will offer a variety of new content including five updated soldier classes, increased soldier customization, more alien and enemy types, evolved tactical combat and more.

Source: The Game Website.

178835.description:
Bruti is a card game that reproduces arm to arm fights in a medieval fantasy setting, designed by Gipi.
It plays 2, 3 or 4 players, in team or free for all.
It's easy to learn, fast paced, fun, and as the title suggests, brutal.

Each player is represented by a bloodthirsty Brute.
These characters, like any warrior worth his name, can be equipped with different kinds of weapon, shields, armours and special objects that can be used during the fight. The choice of the equipment and the Brute unique special power determine how many cards the player can bring to the fight.

The cards let you attack the player or perform special actions. The objective of the game is to defeat your opponent's Brute.
A succesfully landed attack (not prevented with special cards, armours or shields) forces the target to discard cards from his hand, If the target has no more cards to discard he must draw a card from the damage deck.
A damage card is often a bad thing (a wound a mutilation, or even a sudden death) but can give bonuses (like going berserk) as well.

Contents of the box:
116 Combat cards
20 Characters cards
7 Special characters cards
44 Gruesome Damage cards
42 Special Objects cards
24 Equipment minicards
16 Mystical Invocations minicards
12 Condition minicards
6 Movement minicards
20 Mocking Gods cards
16 "Ears" minicards
24 Special Abilities minicards
1 Boardgame
1 Game Rules
178835.name: Bruti

178836.name: Castle Quest
178836.description:
User Summary
A strange mashup of chess, poker and chess. The player must move his pieces around the board to capture the computer's king. Each piece has specific spells and combat is decided by a Final Fantasy or Dragon Quest style combat system using poker cards.
Originally on the Famicom in Japanese it was ported to Gameboy and released in Europe.

178837.description:
The Myths and Legends Continue

A long time ago, before the Eternal Order of Perseus was formed, all sorts of ancient, terrible magics and evil creatures rampaged across the earth. As the Tomb has traveled our universe, moving across the ley lines of otherworldly energies, it has been the harbinger of mysterious, supernatural, inhuman forces. Now, only the audacious adventurers of the E.O.P. can stop these powers, once lost and long forgotten to the depths of the Tomb, now returned to cry havoc.

This expansion presents six new and exciting scenarios, each with an immersive story and deadly creatures! Will you win the race for the Holy Grail against the German Super Soldier Maelstrom Squad? Or survive the night with a Tomb filled with vampire mobsters? Can you protect an ancient spider queen while she spins her magical web? Find Captain Nemo’s submarine before the Russians steal it or the Hell Golem sinks it! Prevent a deranged doctor from harnessing Medusa’s magic for his evil plans. Stop the ancient nemesis of the E.O.P., the draconians, from returning to Earth!

To aid you in your quest, included are six diverse adventurers, equipped and ready to venture into the Tomb. In addition, there are six lavishly illustrated room tiles to explore. While on these new expeditions, you’ll find new items, artifacts, story cards, companions, and creatures—all in your quest to discover the Secrets of the Lost Tomb: Ancient Myths and Legends!
178837.name: Secrets of the Lost Tomb: Ancient Myths and Legends

178838.name: The Hobbit Hole (Issue 5 - Mar 2006)
rpgissuearticle: Random Mail From The All Seeing Eye
178838.description:
The fifth issue of The Hobbit Hole zine. Contents:
Pithy Comments From The Publisher - James Shipman
Advertisement: Join the Trollgod's Elite Champions
Advertisement: Tunnels and Trolls Mini-Solos Available
Random Mail From The All Seeing Eye
Elf Weapons In Trollworld - Ken St. Andre
Weird Gamer Quotes
Best Of Trollwalla Limericks
Rags To Riches In Khazan - Joseph Diaz
Map: World of Kaball - Philip Xavier
Wishing Well of Doom, a mini-Tunnels & Trolls Solo - Max Power

178839.description:
Foodfighters is a fun and light two-player battle game - each player controls a team of foods trying to win a food fight against the opposing team. First player to knock out three matching foods from the other team wins!

You and your opponent each control a faction of fighting foods. On your turn, you can move a Foodfighter, or roll dice to attack an opponent (that your Foodfighter is thinking about and that is in reach), or roll for Beans (cash). After that you can spend your Beans to buy awesome gear from the store or Power cards that are unique to your team. Then it's the other guy's turn. Keep going until you've knocked out three of a kind on your opponent's team, and you've won!
178839.name: Foodfighters
boardgamefamily: Games by the Game Artisans of Canada
boardgamepodcastepisode: Food Fighters Review with the Game Boy Geek

178840.description:
The End is Near!

Thousands of years before recorded history, when man was still infantile, the eternal powers protected Earth with the consent of the gods. When those gods saw mankind mistreat the world, though, the deities saw fit to create two horrific punishments: the Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse and da Vinci's inventions. These ungodly forces on Earth chime the resounding gong of the end of days, and now only an expedition dispatched by the E.O.P. can prevent the Apocalypse from destroying our world.

This expansion pack includes three great scenarios and the giant Journey to the Tomb tile, each adding great gameplay and immersive stories that will thrill your senses. Will you survive the plagues of Egypt and escape the grasp of Death himself? Can your team undo the prophecy and make their own fate in a race against the Four Horsemen? Will you recover the secret to da Vinci’s greatest invention—and greatest mistake—in order to stop the dead from rising and destroying humankind?
